Description: <lig>Lightning resistance</lig> <y>-1% per charge</y>.<br3>Deal <lig> 1 Lightning damage per charge </lig>to the target's sides at the <w>start of the turn</w>.
DescriptionExtended: <lig>Lightning resistance</lig> <y>-1% per charge</y>.<br3>Deal <lig> 1 Lightning damage per charge </lig>to the target's sides at the <w>start of the turn</w>, then remove 1 charge.<br3>This damage <w>can be blocked</w> and is not affected by other modifiers.
